程序包 engine.adminNotification

接口 Subscriber

所有已知实现类:
CurrentOperator, UserModel
public interface Subscriber
Interface for a subscriber to the admin notification system.

    • update

    • getName

    • broadCast

      void broadCast(Publisher publisher, String message, String facilityId)
      Broadcast the message to all the subscribers(except the sender)
      参数:
      publisher - - the publisher of the message
      message - - the message to be broadcasted
      facilityId - - the facility id of the publisher if the id is null, then broadcast to all the subscribers if the id is not null, then broadcast to all the subscribers who work on the specified facility

    • receiveMessage

      ArrayList<String> receiveMessage()
      since our application is console based, we have to implement this method - receiver receives the message

    • getFacilityId

      String getFacilityId()
